price: „Слављен и Узвишен је наш Господар!“, рекоше, „ми смо, уистину, били неправедни!“
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
